safetyTips: We are 2 family members working using masks and gloves . We have strict distance measures that keeps our customers a safe distance from us and food.
name: SALATA ASHFORD
description: Fresh, wholefoods! Salads, wraps , Jacket potatoes (regular and sweet potatoes!) with lots of options. Can be customised to vegan/glutenfree/dairyfree/vegetarian/ keto/lowfat/lowcarb or any other preference or restrictions you have! Call- pre order- collect or come to shop and buy.  Also deliveries with Justeat!
